title: The blessednesse of the death of these that die in the Lord and more especially in ane evil time excellently discoursed in seven very searching but sweet sermons on Revel. 14, v. 13 : wherein several weighty cases relating to death in genereal and to dieing in Lord in particular are succinctly, solidly and satisfieingly handled / by James Durham.
author: Durham, James, 1622-1658.
notes: "Whereunto, at the desire of the worthy widow and other ... friends of ... Minister of the Gospel, Mr. William Guthry, there is affixed a vindication of his sweet smelling memory.
"Epistle dedicatory" and "To the reader," p. [1]-[36] signed: J.C.
"Advertisement by Agness Campbell, relict of the deceast Mr. William Guthrie"--p. 127-128.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
